creditline: The Katherine Kittridge McMillan Memorial Fund
inscription: Devanagari inscription identifies attendant figures as Lakshmi and Arjuna
medium: Opaque watercolor heightened with gold on paper
text: A large figure with numerous arms, faces, and legs of red, green, white, yellow, blue and gray. The hands are holding numerous different implements and weapons. The figure is wearing a large crown, and is flanked by other much smaller people facing him.
title: The Cosmic Form of Krishna
